TopicTitle: Where can i find mods that can increase torque on robotics or strengthen robotic dlc parts?

Articles.Content: im building starscream from transformers and i have problems with the robotics the game gives u being too weak and wobbly and overall weak. they wont even reach the desired angle!!
I do not use mods but I have moved your post where the people who do hang around and might be able to give you advice. Good luck.
